message: Hello, how can I help you?

intents.name: price_faq
utterances: How much does your service cost?
Is there a fee for using your product?
What is the pricing model for your service?
Can you give me an estimate of how much it would cost to use your product?
Is there a free trial available?
responses: Our pricing depends on the specific plan you choose. You can find more information about our pricing on our website.

intents.name: features_faq
utterances: What features does your product have?
Can you tell me more about what your product can do?
What sets your product apart from competitors?
Is there a feature roadmap available?
Can I suggest new features to be added to your product?
responses: Our product offers a range of features including [list of features]. You can find more information on our website

intents.name: support_faq
utterances: How can I get in touch with customer support?
Is there a knowledge base or FAQ available?
What kind of support is provided for your product?
Can you provide assistance with troubleshooting issues?
Is there a community forum or chat where I can get help from other users?
responses: You can get in touch with our customer support team through [support channels]. You can find more information on our website

intents.name: security_faq
utterances: How secure is your product?
What measures do you take to protect user data?
Is two-factor authentication supported?
What is your company's approach to data privacy?
Are there any security certifications or audits for your product?
responses: Our product follows strict security measures and protocols to protect user data. You can find more information on our website
